stories.text:
I read Wireguard white paper lately and later discovered tailscale. This Software defined Networking/VPN kind of domain was really interesting to me and upon exploring further, I came across following interesting projects:

- tailscale (WireGuard)

- innernet (Wireguard)

- headscale (Wiregarud, control server for tailscale)

- nebula

- ZeroTier (virtual ethernet)

- weron (WebRTC for SDN)

What other interesting SDN/VPN projects are out there that you find very interesting/magical?

(edit to fix formatting)
stories.title: Ask HN: Interesting SDN/VPN Projects?

stories.text: I made a landing page for my startup, and I've so many things to do, so I'd prefer to save up energy and not setup Mailgun, a separate db table for emails, form validation and all that. Maybe there is a service that provides an iframe for email submission so that I could slap it on my landing page, and get my future users' emails in Airtable or something?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a web app to collect emails?
